thread.title: Leading Cloud Services Provider INFINIT CONSULTING Joins Gridstore Accelerate Partner Program
thread.title_full: Leading Cloud Services Provider INFINIT CONSULTING Joins Gridstore Accelerate Partner Program

author: admin
title: Leading Cloud Services Provider INFINIT CONSULTING Joins Gridstore Accelerate Partner Program
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 5:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Gridstore, Inc. 
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA--(Marketwired - October 22, 2015) - Gridstore Â®, the leader in hyper-converged all flash infrastructure for the Microsoft Cloud-Inspired Data Center today announced that INFINIT CONSULTING, a leading Cloud Solutions Provider (CSP) and Microsoft 2015 Northwest Partner of the Year has joined the Gridstore Accelerate Partner Program. With the addition of Gridstore's all-flash HyperConverged Infrastructure solutions, this alliance will allow INFINIT to dramatically expand and enhance their Tier 1 Public, Private & Hybrid Cloud hosting solutions, based on the Microsoft Cloud OS and Windows Azure Pack platforms. 
Tweet this: @infinit_c joins forces with @gridstore for #cloud and #hyperconverged infrastructure solutions http://bit.ly/1kVkLu8 
"Partnering with Gridstore will allow INFINIT to fully leverage our Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider designation and our expertise building and designing next generation cloud hosting infrastructures," said Jerod Powell, CEO of INFINIT CONSULTING. "Deploying Gridstore's HCAs allows us to provide the high-performance, scalable and highly versatile cloud solutions demanded by our customers, allowing them to fully leverage the power of the INFINIT Cloud to support enterprise digital transformation and the adoption of the 3 rd Platform." 
Gridstore's Accelerate Partner Program provides materials, resources and experience, equipping partners with the tools needed to successfully promote an innovative solution that lowers TCO, optimizes Microsoft workloads, and offers customers tangible value. With Gridstore's HyperConverged Infrastructure, partners are providing offerings that are designed to accelerate application performance in virtualized environments. The Gridstore Accelerate Program enables partners to profitably expand their business and deliver true customer value. 
"We are very pleased that INFINIT has joined the Accelerate Program; they will play an integral role in expanding our reach into the Microsoft cloud solutions market," said Victoria Grey, chief marketing officer, Gridstore. "They bring a tremendous level of subject matter expertise and we share the same values when it comes to working with customers."
